name: dbScanList
description: A scan list is a collection of dbScanInsts in a particular order that must be
respected when performing scan reordering and repartitioning. For ScanList with
two or more elements we say that they are ORDERED. If the ScanList contains only
one element then they are FLOATING elements that don't have any restriccion when

fields.name: unused_
fields.comment: // As the elements of a free dbTable are 12 bytes long, we need this additional member in order to make _dbScanList big enough to allow safe casting between table members.
